speakers.text: Welcome to Open Minds from Creative Commons. I'm Eric Stoyer.

speakers.speaker: SPEAKER_00
speakers.text: If you're new to Creative Commons, or CC as we call it, we're a non-profit organization that works with people and institutions all around the world to make information, creativity, research, and educational resources open and accessible to everyone, without legal barriers

speakers.speaker: SPEAKER_00
speakers.text: such as restrictive copyright.

speakers.speaker: SPEAKER_00
speakers.text: If you listened to our first episode, which was an interview with Creative Commons CEO

speakers.speaker: SPEAKER_00
speakers.text: Catherine Styler, you heard us talk about the fact that it's CC's 20th anniversary

speakers.speaker: SPEAKER_00
speakers.text: this year.

speakers.speaker: SPEAKER_00
speakers.text: And one of the ways we're celebrating is with this podcast, a series of conversations with people working on the issues we're involved with and subjects we're excited about.

speakers.speaker: SPEAKER_00
